column1: Gárulf was a Man of Rohan during the War of the Ring.
Gárulf was a rider in the Éored of Éomer
column2: Third Marshal of the Riddermark. His Éored Ambush at Fangorn Forest‎ the Uruk-hai of Uglúk under the eaves of Fangorn Forest
column3: where Gárulf was killed. His horse Hasufel was given to Aragorn by Éomer when they first met in the Wold.

column1: Gárulf is Old English for "spear-wolf". It was a name of a jutish warrior in the Beowulf and the Finnsburg Fragment.
